name: Snyder's of Hanover Sourdough Hard Pretzels, 16 Oz Bag
short_description: SOURDOUGH PRETZELS WITH THE CRUNCH YOU CRAVE: Slow-baked to seal in the flavor of real sourdough
NON-GMO SCHOOL SNACK: Our pretzels are non-GMO Project Verified and made in a facility that does not process peanuts
FAT-FREE SNACK: A fat-free snack made from wholesome ingredients that the whole family can enjoy
GREAT SNACK FOR FOOTBALL SEASON: Open a bag for an easy party snack with your favorite spreads or dips
FAMILY SIZE BAG: Shareable 16 ounce large bag
product_description: Product Description With Snyder's of Hanover Sourdough Hard Pretzels,you can enjoy the great taste of aged sourdough in a crunchy, traditional pretzel shape. Everyone can enjoy this Non-GMO Project Verified snack, which is made in a facility that does not process peanuts. That makes them ideal for school, lunches, sports and on the go. Or pair this fat-free snack with hummus, cheese spreads, dips, or enjoy them right out of the bag. Snyder's of Hanover has been America's Pretzel Bakery since 1909 and our pretzels give you that delicious crunch for the perfect snack! Snyder's of Hanover pretzels are kneaded and oven-baked to seal in all the flavor. Snyder's of Hanover pretzels have been shared across tables, across generations and across the country, making us America's favorite pretzel brand. This 16-ounce Family Size Bag of Snyder's Sourdough Pretzels has plenty for sharing with friends and family. Feed all your cravings with Snyder’s pretzel snacks. From the Manufacturer All the flavor of genuine, aged sourdough in a crunchy, traditional pretzel shape. Snyder's of Hanover Sourdough Pretzels are a perfect snack at home or on-the-go, and as complement to soups and salads. Plus, they're non-GMO project verified and made in a facility that does not process peanuts. Pair this fat-free snack with hummus, cheese spreads, or warm dip for family gatherings or while watching the big game during football season. Snyder's of Hanover has been America's Pretzel Bakery since 1909 and our pretzels give you that delicious crunch for the perfect snack! Non-GMO project verified and made in a facility that does not process peanuts, Snyder's of Hanover pretzels are made from wholesome ingredients, kneaded, and oven-baked to seal in all the flavor. Snyder's of Hanover pretzels have been shared across tables, across generations and across the country, making us America's favorite pretzel brand.

name: Tom Sturgis Sourdough Hard Pretzels 'N' Pieces 12 oz. Bags (3 Bags)
short_description: BRAND NEW! Tom Sturgis Sourdough Hard Pretzels in a 12 oz. Bag
Crunchy. Crispy. Flavorful. Available in Orders of 3 or 4 Bags.
Since 1861 America's first pretzel baking family.
Made with all natural ingredients. There are zero grams trans fat.
product_description: Several years ago the masterminds at Tom Sturgis Pretzels twisted their ideas, dreams, and years of baking experience together and began the process of creating the brand new product you now hold in your hands-the Sourdough Hard Pretzels ‘N’ pieces. Different than other pretzel varieties, They’re crunchy… They’re bursting with flavor…. And they’re addicting! When working with sourdough our bakers experience a lengthy, more labor-intensive baking process than required with other pretzel varieties. Worth the hard work, though, these delicious concoctions will take your pretzel snacking to a whole ‘nother level.

name: Unique Snacks Sourdough Craft Beer Pretzel Rings, Delicious Homestyle Baked Snack Bag, Vegan, OU Kosher, and Non-GMO Food, No Artificial Flavor, 11 Oz. Bag, Pack of 6
short_description: PRETZEL RINGS: Sourdough Craft Beer Pretzel Rings are a delicious and unique twist on the classic pretzel snack. Made with Craft Beer in mind, these rings have a distinct flavor and texture that sets them apart from other pretzel snacks.

HOMESTYLE BAKED: Crafted with care and attention to detail, our Sourdough Craft Beer Pretzel Rings are made using traditional baking methods and high-quality ingredients. Its every element, down to the shape, is designed to complement your brew.

KOSHER SNACKS: Unique Snacks is synonymous with delectable pretzels with authentic flavor. Free of lactose and cholesterol, our Kosher pretzels are your perfect mid-day craving buddy, office companion, or post-college hunger pang savior.

NO ARTIFICIAL INGREDIENTS: Sourced from all-natural ingredients without adding any synthetic flavor, color, preservative, sugar, malt, or trans fat, Sourdough Craft Beer Pretzel Rings are a tasty and satisfying snack that offers a twist on a classic favorite.

MULTIPLE FLAVOR OPTIONS: Available in multiple pack options, Unique Snacks Sourdough Craft Beer Pretzel Rings are excellent for satisfying hunger pangs between meals, indulging in a guilty pleasure, or bringing people together to share a moment of fun.
Kosher Snacks: Our entire product line is Cholesterol FREE and Lactose FREE. All of our pretzels are OU Kosher certified giving you clear nutritional advantages

Quantity: Unique Snacks Sourdough Craft Beer Pretzel Rings come in 11 ounce bags in packs of 3, 6 and 12. Unique Snacks is known for its one-of-a-kind quality and continues the family tradition that has delighted pretzel lovers for over a century
product_description: Unique Snacks Sourdough Craft Beer Pretzel Rings are a delicious and unique twist on the classic pretzel snack. Made with Craft Beer in mind, these pretzel rings have a distinct flavor and texture that sets them apart from other pretzel snacks. Our lactose-free and cholesterol-free Kosher pretzels are your perfect mid-day craving buddy, office companion, or post-college hunger pang savior. Its every element, down to the shape, is designed to complement your brew. Available in 3, 6, and 12-pack options, Unique Snacks Sourdough Craft Beer Pretzel Rings are excellent for satisfying hunger pangs between meals, indulging in a guilty pleasure, or bringing people together to share a moment of fun.

name: Utz Sourdough Specials Pretzels - Classic Sourdough Pretzel, Perfectly Salted Crunchy Sourdough Pretzel with Zero Cholesterol per Serving, 28 oz. Barrel
short_description: CLASSIC SOURDOUGH FLAVOR: Utz Sourdough SpecialsPretzels havejust the right amount of saltand a light crunch. These pretzels are made with aged sourdoughand baked to give you that soft cracker-like bite in the rich flavor you crave!

GREAT FOR DIPPING: These sourdough pretzels are terrific for a snack on their own, but are great with added dip, too. Make chocolate-covered pretzels for the perfect salty/sweet combo, add a cheese dip or enjoy all on their own – the versatility is endless!

PERFECT SNACK: This barrel of sourdough pretzels is just what you need to curl up on the couch or set out for large party. Perfect for on-the-go snacks in the car or to pack in lunches. Plus, the resealable container will keep them fresh longer.

ZERO CHOLESTEROL: With no cholesterol or trans-fat, these pretzel snacks are gult-free!. Keep them in your desk for a quick pick-me-up through your next meeting, pack in lunches and keep them on hand for parties.

WE ARE UTZ – Since 1921, Utz has been making and selling quality pretzels and other delicious snacks in Hanover, PA, the snack capital of the world! We’re a family-managed business providing snacks that are crunchier, lighter, fresher and simply better.
product_description: Don’t settle for any old sourdough hard pretzel when you can grab a barrel of Utz Sourdough Specials Pretzels and get that giant, delectable combination of aged sourdough and salt that you crave! Individually twisted and perfectly baked, these pretzels give you the thick crunch you’re searching for. Share them - or don’t - with this resealable barrel that keeps them fresh longer! Utz Sourdough Specials Pretzels are perfect on their own or pair with cheese dip or mustard for a crowd-pleasing appetizer. You can store them in the pantry for when the craving strikes or pack a few for lunch - the possibilities are endless, and that makes Utz Sourdough Specials Pretzels your best snack yet! With zero cholesterol and trans-fat, Utz pretzels offer a lighter go-to snack to enjoy. With clean and simple ingredients, Utz uses a baking process that ensures that you get the freshest, crispiest crunch you crave! Since 1921, Utz has been making and selling quality potato chips, pretzels, popcorn, pork rinds and other delicious snacks in Hanover, PA, the snack capital of the world! Our story began with Bill and Salie, who started making and selling potato chips almost 100 years ago, and now we are the largest independent privately-held snack brand in the U.S. Today, we’re still a family-managed business providing snacks that are crunchier, lighter, fresher and simply better. Each day we set out to honor our century of heritage and deliver the world-class innovation and products consumers will love for generations.
